backend/main.mo: Defines game rule types, concrete rule objects for multiple games including Generic Game, and begins an actor with game session logic and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions and a migration function converting old game/session types to updated ones including Generic Game.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected frontend files and components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files, covering screens, components, hooks, and game template logic.
frontend/deployment-logs/.gitignore: Ensures deployment log files are ignored while keeping the directory.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation describing prerequisites and steps to perform local deployment and collect debugging information.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining color variables, themes, and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React root element and main entry script.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-and-capture-log: Node script that automates rebuild and deployment steps while capturing logs to timestamped files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root React Router structure, renders layout, and shows a profile setup dialog when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for authentication states and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog to collect and save a user's display name via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, mobile menu, and outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/scores/EditRound: Dialog for editing a game round, selecting the correct score entry component based on game type and handling confirmation.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: Handles Flip7 round scoring with card selection, modifiers, multipliers, manual input, and score calculation.
frontend/src/components/scores/GenericGa: Collects numeric scores for all players in a generic game and submits them with simple validation.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: React component for entering Mille Bornes scoring details per player, handling distance, bonuses, and boolean achievements, then computing and submitting final scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: React component that collects Nerts center and tableau card counts per player, computes round scores, validates input, and submits results.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays a table of past rounds with each player's score and provides an edit button for each round.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Simple score entry form for Skyjo that captures numeric scores per player, validates them, and submits round data.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines built‑in game templates and a factory function that converts template IDs into backend GameType objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the user’s identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the authenticated user’s profile using the actor and exposes loading and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating game sessions through backend actor calls with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and retrieving individual player profiles via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining theme colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Utility functions to compute player standings and determine game end conditions based on scores and game type.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Type definitions for session players, rounds, entry states, and session metadata used across scoring and UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that renders the root component within React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: Displays available game templates and lets users navigate to game setup by selecting one.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Shows authenticated users a list of saved game sessions with options to view or continue them.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: Allows authenticated users to create and manage player profiles, displaying them in a table.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Loads a game session (saved or quick), renders the score sheet UI, and manages adding and editing rounds based on the selected game template.
Handles player selection and configuration for starting a new game session, supporting both profile-based and quick-play modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, and progress related to adding a Generic Game scorecard template.
